duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan production and design of transportation projects, including city street and TxDOT highway improvements.
Research & complete technical design tasks, plan production and delivery of projects as required and/or assigned.
Preparing construction documents for public and/or private public works infrastructure projects.
Establishing good communication and collaborative working relationships with team members & clients.
Effectively coordinating & collaborating with technical experts, other engineering design teams and assisting in the technical training and development of young Civil Engineers.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Civil Engineering,Current registration as a Professional Engineer (Civil) in the State of Texas, or the ability to obtain State of Texas P.E. certification within one (1) year
